text: (upbeat music)

- So Brunei underwent an
industry transformation.
When you go into digital transformation,
you need three things to happen.

One is the technology stack
needs to be redefined.
The other one is the process,
and the third one is the people.

We started off with the
technology transformation.

The traditional telco
evolving into techco,

essentially, is moving the
IT stack onto the cloud.
There's no more hardware.
It's all software.
The next part is from techco to digitalco.
Everything is just a digital product.

AWS has allowed us to build
our dreams in the cloud.
So we have this project called Super App.
What it means for our customers,
now they're able to do more things
than beyond telco service on our app.
They'll be paying bills,

and they can start paying
for their school fees.
They can start ordering their food.

Because of this new
industry transformation,

we are able to look at
customers more focused.
(gentle music)
- In IT, we only look at two things,
value and non-value, right?
So value to us is development.

We want to focus on
the skill on developing

and improve the experience
of the customers.

Non-value to us is
handling infrastructure,

and we realized that AWS
have hundreds of apps

in the marketplace that
we can utilize easily.
So we decided, "Hey, you know,
why not just build on one ecosystem?"
The project of this landing zone
was actually a three years project,
but we did it in seven months.
To us, cloud is very important
because we do not need to now worry
about the configuration of the service.
All we need to worry about

is how soon we can finish
testing the features,

like for example, nine months
to a one-week deployment.

That will be very
important for a customer.
So AWS go to an extent

to actually transform in
the mindset of the people.
The experience and the exposure
that we got from AWS is invaluable.
(gentle upbeat music)

- The next years is the second
wave of our digital strategy,

where from limitless
connectivity everywhere,
we are now moving towards
what we call Digitalizing Everyone.

You know, what will
success look like to me?
When there's a small store,
and it will bring them into our ecosystem.

First, give them the payment
system, which is our MyDST.

Secondly, we are also
building this delivery engine,

where now instead of
serving their community
within village or district,

they're now able to serve
the whole of Brunei.
Our digital transformation strategy

has allowed us to be more
agile, more innovative,
and the result speaks for itself.
(gentle upbeat music)
(gentle upbeat music fades)
